attributes.action: Secure bank of england interest rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Guarantee a set period of bank of england maximmum interest rate increases, so that the public can go out and spend money to restart the economy, without the fear that as soon as they have committed to spend cash interest rates will shoot up and leave them unable to meet their commitments with regards to loans taken out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
